S

saveScores(ArrayList<String>, ArrayList<String>) - Method in class pkg2048game.ScoreKeeping
Method will take in two arraylists and add the values saved into the txt file into the respect arraylist
ScoreKeeping - Class in pkg2048game
 
ScoreKeeping() - Constructor for class pkg2048game.ScoreKeeping
 
sortColumns() - Method in class pkg2048game.Board2048
Method is called whenever the sort columns button is pressed, the method uses bubble sort on columns of the 2d array in order to sort them in ascending order.
sortColumns() - Method in class pkg2048game.BoardClass
 
sortRows() - Method in class pkg2048game.Board2048
Method is called whenever the sort rows button is pressed, the method uses selection sort on rows of the 2d array in order to sort them in ascending order.
sortRows() - Method in class pkg2048game.BoardClass
 
startGame() - Method in class pkg2048game.Board2048
Method is called whenever the start game button is pressed
startGame() - Method in class pkg2048game.BoardClass
 
StartGameWindow - Class in pkg2048game
Class creates and displays the start window screen when game is run
StartGameWindow(int, int, String) - Constructor for class pkg2048game.StartGameWindow
Constructor method for start window will take in size and caption and create the window
